article: sri lanka 's embattled prime minister on thursday accused the president of further endangering the island 's delicate peace process by firing officials overseeing the rehabilitation and resettlement of minority tamils .
abstract: sri lanka prime minister accuses rival president of jeopardizing peace efforts
